section.h2: Top played tracks from the last month

section.div: Favorites genres: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Drama, Romance

div.div:
An ordinary walk home from school turns into an epic journey for Usato. After suddenly being dropped into another world with two fellow students, Usato learns he was summoned there by accident. But things turn around when he discovers a unique aptitude for healing magic! Now, he trains beyond human limitations, using his self-healing abilities to gain absurd strength and unrivaled stamina.
(Source: Crunchyroll)

A hard-working boy named Will enters a magic academy in hopes of becoming a great sorcerer. Unfortunately, there's a fatal flaw in his plan: he lacks the ability to use magic. Amid the cold stares of his classmates and instructors, Will feels discouraged at times, but he presses forward with unwavering determination. He can't use a wand, but he can wield a sword in his battle to reach the top of a magic-dominated world. He just needs to believe in his own unique strengths and remember the promise he made with someone precious to him...
(Source: Crunchyroll)

Although Baroness Cassia is on her deathbed, shes relieved that it means shes finally free from her loveless marriage to her mercenary husband, Zester. Oh, how she regrets her tireless efforts to keep his territory afloat! If only she had taken more time for herself. Her wish becomes reality when Cassia wakes up to find herself ten years back in the past. With this second chance, shes determined to live a stress-free life. But can Cassia find the courage to rebel against Zester? Or is she doomed to repeat her nightmare of a past life?
(Source: Tapas)

Excellent grades, good looks, above average fighting skills, and a sense of justice. A first grade model student, Kim Hyunsung was pushed off a rooftop just before his graduation and became a vegetative patient. For ten years, he endured hellish days with only his hearing and consciousness intact, yet unable to die, he suddenly returns to the day when the bullying began. (Source: Naver, translated)
How do you use Aeron MDS with multiple publishers and a single subscriber where the publishers are unaware of the subscriber machine IPs?

I am trying to use Aeron Multi-Destination-Subscriptions where I have multiple publishers publish messages to their own IP address and port. I want a subscriber to subscribe to each of the publishers IP addresses and PORTs on the same stream ID. The publishers and subscribers are on separate machines. For simplicity, I'm testing this with a single Publisher and Subscriber setup. I am using docker to create a virtual network so I can designate the IPs of the publisher and subscriber machines. Here is my example code: Publication code final String publicationChannel = new ChannelUriStringBuilder() .media(UDP_MEDIA) (3 more lines were trimmed) Subscription code final String subscriptionChannel = new ChannelUriStringBuilder() .media(UDP_MEDIA) (8 more lines were trimmed) I have a doWork in both of these which repeatedly call subscription.isConnected() and publication.isConnected(). I expected this to work just like the MDC example where you can use control-mode=manual on the publication side and call publication.addDestination(subscriberIP:port) where the subscription would be setup to subscribe to its own subscriberIP:port. In testing, the publication and subscription are not connected. This test class in the aeron repo uses MDS over UDP using localhost and using multicast addresses MDSTest so I thought the same would hold true for using the publisher machines IP and port. Would really appreciate if someone could explain why this doesn't work?
